content: A default constructor will build the most basic instance. Generally, this means assigning all the fields values like null, zero, or an empty string. Nothing would stop you, however, from setting the color of your default sports car color to red, but this is generally bad programming style. Another programmer would be confused if your basic car came out red instead of say, colorless.
